fullText: The Cher Show is a jukebox musical that works harder than most to justify its existence, and mostly succeeds in doing so by focusing on what made Cher an icon: her ability to constantly reinvent herself.
dtliExcerpt: The Cher Show is a jukebox musical that works harder than most to justify its existence, and mostly succeeds in doing so by focusing on what made Cher an icon: her ability to constantly reinvent herself.
